title: WorldEditor
tag_line: Edit your world, move parts, all in-game.
category_description: With these plugins you can create entire new worlds or terraform sections of existing worlds. Your server just won't be the same without them!
description:
WorldEditor is a port of the WorldEdit plugin in Bukkit. It is currently in development and lacks multiple features.
With it you can edit anything inside the server, moving parts of the map, adding new sections, and more.

[SIZE=5][URL=https://github.com/shoghicp/WorldEditor/blob/master/README.md']WorldEditor usage[/URL][/SIZE]

[B]Changelog:[/B]
[CODE]0.4:
- Alpha_1.2 compatible release

0.5:
- Alpha_1.2.1 compatible release
- Added Multiple Block lists for //set
- Added Multiple Block lists for replacement block //replace
- Added //limit, //desel, //wand, //sphere, //hsphere, /toggleeditwand
- Separated selections for each player
- In-game selection mode
- Sessions

0.6:
- Alpha_1.3dev compatible release

0.7:
- Multiworld compatible release
- Added correct block counts

0.8:
- Added //copy, //paste, //cut

0.9:
- Improved memory consumption on big changes
[/CODE]
